email_subject: Looking for a quick, affordable way to upgrade your PC? (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: Is your PC acting a bit sluggish? Does is sometimes choke on large graphics files or spend more time than ever spinning its hard drive? Adding more RAM to your system may be the perfect answer to your computing woes. With more RAM, you'll be able to get more out of your favorite games, graphics applications, and other resource-intensive applications. Unfortunately, figuring out what type of RAM to buy can be both difficult and frustrating. Luckily, CNET's all-in-one Memory Configurator makes finding the perfect memory easier than ever! Whatever type of system you have, your just a few clicks away from the upgrade you'll need to get your system living up to its full potential. Check out CNET's new Memory Configurator. Sign up now to give your customers a whole new level of service. Tell me more about ChannelOnline.
